title: Drawing, "Design for a Cover of Fortune Magazine", November 1945
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on illustration board
signed: Signed in blue gouache, lower left:  Mcknight Kauffer
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Image of the interior of a cargo ship.  At bottom center are two blue silhouettes of workers, one is pushing a barrel at center and the other to the right is leaning against cargo containers.  Seen at top is the opening where another worker signals down a crane, lowering a cargo container.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cover of Fortune Magazine", November 1945.
November 1945. Brush and gouache, graphite on illustration board. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-1217.
